attributes.action: support David Cameron and his stance on Syria
attributes.additional_details:
I am ashamed of the behaviour of the members of Parliament who voted against the bill yesterday; we are all aware of the effects of Iraq, but Syria is different.  Having listened to John Kerry this evening I am embarressed to be British.  David Cameron should not be berated for his actions but be commended; the members of Parliament who voted against should hang their heads in shame!
I want the people of Britain to support their Prime Minister and I want the MPs to reconvene and vote for action against Syria's govenrment.
